meanings.definition: To look at and comprehend the meaning of written or printed matter by interpreting the characters or symbols of which it is composed.
meanings.sent1: I can read the book and understand the story.
meanings.sent2: She likes to read novels in her free time.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to read the newspaper but got distracted by a fly.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes could read the sadness in his expression.
meanings.sent5: He read the map carefully to find the hidden treasure.

meanings.definition: To utter aloud the words of (a written or printed passage).
meanings.sent1: Please read the poem out loud for the class.
meanings.sent2: He read the speech confidently during the event.
meanings.sent3: The parrot tried to read the menu but ended up squawking instead.
meanings.sent4: Her voice could read the emotions in the lyrics she sang.
meanings.sent5: They read the play with passion and enthusiasm.

meanings.definition: To understand or interpret the nature or significance of.
meanings.sent1: I can read his intentions from his actions.
meanings.sent2: She read the situation correctly and acted accordingly.
meanings.sent3: The detective tried to read the suspect's poker face.
meanings.sent4: Her intuition could read the truth behind his words.
meanings.sent5: He could read the excitement in her eyes.

meanings.definition: To interpret or understand the meaning of (a gesture, a look, etc.).
meanings.sent1: She could read the disappointment in his eyes.
meanings.sent2: He read her smile as a sign of happiness.
meanings.sent3: The robot tried to read the confused expression on the human's face.
meanings.sent4: Her experience allowed her to read the subtle cues in the conversation.
meanings.sent5: He could read the tension in the room.

meanings.definition: To study or peruse the writings of (an author).
meanings.sent1: Students often read Shakespeare's plays in literature class.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys reading the works of classic authors.
meanings.sent3: The librarian tried to read the ancient manuscript but couldn't decipher the language.
meanings.sent4: His analysis could read the deeper themes in the text.
meanings.sent5: He read the poet's words with admiration and respect.
